meanings.sent1: During the party, the noisemakings were so loud!
meanings.sent2: I heard strange noisemakings coming from the attic.
meanings.sent3: The noisemakings from the kitchen sounded like a concert!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was a noisemakings that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The noisemakings of the thunderstorm kept me awake all night.

meanings.definition: Devices or objects used to create loud sounds.
meanings.sent1: The children played with colorful noisemakings at the parade.
meanings.sent2: The noisemakings at the concert added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: The noisemakings in the toy store made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His motorcycle roared like a powerful noisemakings.
meanings.sent5: The noisemakings of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
